reasoning_log: The matching process involved categorizing images based on room type (living, kitchen, bath, bedroom, public areas) and then using specific tags (e.g., 'I-shaped kitchen', 'wet/dry separation', 'mailbox area', 'washing machine') for precise 1:1 alignment. Images I4, I5, I9, I10, I11, and I12 were unique and matched descriptions D4, D5, D9, D10, D11, and D12 with high certainty. The main challenge was differentiating the three living room views (I1, I2, I3) and the two master bedroom views (I6, I7). I2 was clearly the 'entrance area' (D2) due to the visible door and AC placement. I3 emphasized the large window/balcony view (D3). I1 provided the most comprehensive view of the main living space, including the integrated kitchen, fitting the general 'Living room' description (D1). I6 and I7 depict the same master bedroom; they were assigned sequentially to D6 and D7 based on the slight difference in perspective, both confirming the 'tight space' and 'large storage' tags.

matching_result_list.evidence: General view of the living room showing furniture, track lighting, and integrated kitchen area, fitting the 'furnished' and 'new decor' tags.
View focused on the entrance area, showing the door, a mirror, and the AC unit above, confirming '客廳入口區' and '冷氣既裝'.
The angle emphasizes the large sliding door/window, providing '大面採光' and linking the space to the exterior view.
Clear image of an I-shaped kitchen counter with built-in microwave, stove, sink, and ample upper/lower cabinets, matching '一字型廚房' and '電器櫃規劃'.
Bathroom featuring a glass partition for '乾濕分離' and '止滑木紋磚' (wood-grain floor tiles).
Master bedroom view showing a large bed and a full-height, multi-door wardrobe, confirming '收納量大' and '空間較緊湊'.
Another angle of the master bedroom (same room as I6), highlighting the length of the room and the '集中收納' (wardrobe).

tag_list: 適合單人或小家庭主臥

matching_result_list.evidence: Room dominated by a large, modular shelving/storage unit, fitting the '多功能房' and '收納櫃完整' description.
Outdoor balcony view showing a washing machine installed and strong sunlight through the '安全格柵', confirming '陽台洗衣區'.
Large room containing various exercise machines (treadmills, weights), matching '公設健身房' and '空間寬敞'.
Image of a long bank of numbered mailboxes in a modern, well-lit lobby area, matching '大樓信箱區'.
Indoor parking garage with clear white markings and a car parked in a designated spot, confirming '地下停車位' and '車位標線清楚'.
